general_advisory: Farmers are advised to do weeding and hoeing in the standing crops like Maize, Groundnut, Green gram, Chick pea and vegetables to protect them from weeds. Apply balanced and appropriate fertilizers according to cropâ€™s growth stage. Install yellow sticky trap to monitor sucking pest like White fly, Aphids, Jassids & Thirps in vegetables at vegetative stage. Rouging of viral infested plant should be done in vegetables. Use pheromone trap for monitoring borer insect in vegetables like brinjal, cauliflower, cabbage, tomato etc. Tikka: If symptom is noticed, application of Chlorothalonil 75% WP or Hexaconazole 5% EC or Mancozeb 75% WP mixed with water is recommended.

advisory: Weed Management: Apply herbicide according to crop growth stage. Pest Management: Install pheromone traps to monitor pest population
Tikka: If symptom is noticed, apply recommended chemicals mixed with water
Regularly monitor for pests like grasshopper, aphids, and larvae. Spray recommended chemicals when necessary
Provide vermicompost and manures to the crop.
Spray Dimethoate if little leaf is noticed.
Manage aphids and Jassids infestation with recommended chemicals
Apply appropriate chemicals for mite infestation
Monitor pest population with yellow sticky traps
Use recommended chemicals for controlling white fly infestation
Earthing up required to prevent direct exposure to sun
For Oyster mushroom cultivation use Niger sticks as substrate
